post.description: This endpoint will provide, where possible, an estimate of pricing and fulfillment center assignment of a potential standard (direct to consumer) order. Keep in mind that there are ways for the merchant to change FC assignment or product configuration after order creation that could invalidate this estimate. Estimates cannot be returned for items that are unknown, out of stock, or too large for fulfillment using standard box sizes. Additional services such as high-pick fees, shipping insurance, auto-splitting or auto-adding items to orders, and signature required are not included in this estimate.

parameters.name: shipbob_channel_id

patch.summary: Update a single product with Json Merge Patch functionality
patch.description: Updates a single product. This endpoint supports Json Merge Patch functionality, which allows partial updates to be made to the product. The endpoint will only update the fields that are provided in the request. For updating variants, you mnust include the ID of the variant that you would like to update.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The product identifier

Inventory.DimensionViewModel.description: Information about an inventory item's dimensions

depth.description: Depth in inches of this inventory item

length.description: Length in inches of this inventory item

weight.description: Weight in ounces of this inventory item

width.description: Width in inches of this inventory item

Inventory.FulfillmentCenterQuantityViewM.description: Break down of fulfillable quantity by fulfillment center

awaiting_quantity.description: Amount of quantity awaiting arrival of a receiving order at this fulfillment center

committed_quantity.description: Amount of committed quantity at this fulfillment center

fulfillable_quantity.description: Amount of fulfillable quantity at this fulfillment center

id.description: Unique id of the fulfillment center

internal_transfer_quantity.description:
The quantity of items that are in the process of internal transit 
between ShipBob fulfillment centers, with a destination of this fulfillment center.
These items are not pickable or fulfillable until they have been received and moved 
to the "On Hand" quantity of the destination FC.

onhand_quantity.description: Amount of onhand quantity at this fulfillment center

fulfillable_quantity_by_fulfillment_cent.description: Fulfillable quantity of this inventory item broken down by fulfillment center location

fulfillable_quantity_by_lot.description: Fulfillable quantity of this inventory item broken down by lot

id.description: Unique id of the inventory item

is_active.description: Whether the inventory is active or not

is_case_pick.description: True if the inventory item is marked as case pick

is_digital.description: True if the inventory item is marked as a digital item

is_lot.description: True if this inventory item is organized into lots

total_awaiting_quantity.description: Total quantity in unreceived receiving orders for this inventory item

total_backordered_quantity.description:
The amount of the item you need to send to ShipBob to fulfill all exception orders containing 
the item. This is the exception_quantity less the fulfillable_quantity of the item.

total_committed_quantity.description: Total committed quantity of this inventory item

total_exception_quantity.description:
The total quantity of all items that are contained within orders that
are in exception/out of stock status. Out of stock orders have not been
processed and therefore do not have lot or fulfillment centers assigned.

total_fulfillable_quantity.description: Total fulfillable quantity of this inventory item

total_internal_transfer_quantity.description:
The total quantity of all items that are in the process of internal transit 
between ShipBob fulfillment centers. These items are not pickable or fulfillable
until they have been received and moved to the "On Hand" quantity of the destination FC.
Internal transit quantities for each FC represent the incoming transfer stock
for that specific location.

total_onhand_quantity.description: Total onhand quantity of this inventory item

total_sellable_quantity.description:
Total quantity that can be sold without overselling the inventory item.
This is calculated by subtracting the total exception quantity from the
fulfillable quantity.

Inventory.LotQuantityViewModel.description: Break down of fulfillable quantity by lot

awaiting_quantity.description: Quantity of inventory items belonging to this lot awaiting arrival of a receiving order

committed_quantity.description: Committed quantity of inventory items belonging to this lot

fulfillable_quantity.description: Fulfillable quantity of inventory items belonging to this lot

fulfillable_quantity_by_fulfillment_cent.description: Fulfillable quantity of inventory items belonging to this lot broken down by fulfillment center location

internal_transfer_quantity.description:
The quantity of all items belonging to this lot that are in the process of internal transit 
between ShipBob fulfillment centers. These items are not pickable or fulfillable
until they have been received and moved to the "On Hand" quantity of the destination FC.
Internal transit quantities for each FC represent the incoming transfer stock
for that specific location.

onhand_quantity.description: OnHand quantity of inventory items belonging to this lot

Inventory.SortOrder.description: Specify if you want to sort by newest first or oldest first

Unique id of the channel

gift_message.description: Gift message associated with the order

location_id.description: Desired Fulfillment Center Location ID. If not specified, ShipBob will determine the location that fulfills this order.

products.description: Products included in the order. Products identified by reference_id must also include the product name if there is no matching ShipBob product.

purchase_date.description: Date this order was purchase by the end user

reference_id.description: Unique and immutable order identifier from your upstream system

shipping_method.description: Client-defined shipping method matching what the user has listed as the shipping method on the Ship Option Mapping setup page in the ShipBob Merchant Portal. If they dont match, we will create a new one and default it to Standard

tags.description: Key value pair array to store extra information at the order level for API purposes. ShipBob won't display the info in the ShipBob Merchant Portal or react based on this data.

estimated_price.description: Estimated price in dollars for the provided shipping method

shipping_method.description: Provided shipping method. Maps to ship option in ShipBob.

total_weight_oz.description: Total weight of items in cart including packaging.

products.description: Products to be included in the order. Each product must include one of reference_id or id

shipping_methods.description:
Array of strings specifying shipping methods for which to fetch estimates.

If this field is omitted we will return estimates for all shipping methods defined in ShipBob

Products.Get.Api.Product.SellerSKUEvalud.description: Looks for Products that match the provided Seller query

Products.Get.Api.Product.VariantId.List..description: Looks for products that contain a variant with the given ID

Products.Get.Api.Product.VariantStatus.S.description: Looks for Products with variants that contain provided status

id.description: ID of the Channel Metadata record to be moved

seller_sku.description: New SKU for the Channel Metadata record (optional)

id.description: Unique reference ID for the product

variants.description: The variants of the product to updated. Products that are not multi-variant will only have one variant

Receiving.AddBoxItemToBoxModel.description: Information about an inventory item contained inside a receiving order box

inventory_id.description: Unique inventory id of the items in the box

lot_date.description: Lot expiration date for the items in the box

lot_number.description: Lot number of the items in the box

quantity.description: Quantity of the items in the box

Receiving.AddBoxToOrderModel.description: Information about a box shipment to be added to a receiving order

tracking_number.description: Tracking number for the box shipment

Receiving.AssignOrderToFulfillmentCenter.description:
Model containing information that assigns a receiving order to a fulfillment center.
If the fulfillment center provided is in a receiving hub region, then the response will be the receiving hub location.

id.description: ID of the fulfillment center to assign this receiving order to

Receiving.BoxItemViewModel.description: Information about an item contained inside a box as part of a receiving order

inventory_id.description: Unique identifier of the inventory item

lot_date.description: Expiration date of the item's lot

lot_number.description: Lot number the item belongs to

received_quantity.description: Quantity of the item that was received after processing the receiving order

stowed_quantity.description: Quantity of the item that has been stowed

Receiving.BoxViewModel.description: Information about a box shipment included in a receiving order

box_items.description: Information about the items included in the box

box_number.description: The number of the box in the receiving order

counting_started_date.description: Date counting of the box's inventory items started

tracking_number.description: Tracking number of the box shipment

Receiving.CreateReceivingOrderModel.description: Information to create a new receiving order

boxes.description: Box shipments to be added to this receiving order

expected_arrival_date.description: Expected arrival date of all the box shipments in this receiving order

purchase_order_number.description: Purchase order number for this receiving order

address1.description: Address line one of the fulfillment center

address2.description: Address line two of the fulfillment center

city.description: City the fulfillment center is located in

country.description: Country the fulfillment center is located in

email.description: Email contact for the fulfillment center

id.description: Unique identifier of the fulfillment center

phone_number.description: Phone number contact for the fulfillment center

state.description: State the fulfillment center is located in

timezone.description: Timezone the fulfillment center is located in

zip_code.description: Postal code of the fulfillment center

expected_quantity.description: Quantity of the inventory item submitted in the WRO

received_quantity.description: Quantity of the inventory item received by the warehouse

stowed_quantity.description: Quantity of the inventory item stowed by the warehouse

box_labels_uri.description: URL to the packing slip to be included in each box shipment for this receiving order

expected_arrival_date.description: Expected date that all packages will have arrived

id.description: Unique id of the warehouse receiving order

insert_date.description: Insert date of the receiving order

inventory_quantities.description: Inventory items and quantities within the WRO

last_updated_date.description: Last date the receiving order was updated

purchase_order_number.description: Purchase order number for a receiving order

id.description: Unique id of the channel

inventory.description: Array of inventory items being returned

original_shipment_id.description: Shipment from which the items in the return originated

reference_id.description: Client-defined external unique identifier for the return order

tracking_number.description: Tracking number for the return shipment

id.description: Unique identifier of the fulfillment center

transactions.description: Array of transactions affiliated with the return order

subscription_url.description: URL we will call when an event matching the subscription topic is raised. Must have ssl enabled (https) and accept POST requests with content type of application/json
